__e: Belle, you always brought out the best in me, and right now I need that.
Belle, you remember the woman who locked you up for 28 years.
Find a woman named Belle, and then give her this.
I don't think I said anything, but Belle and I are breaking up.
No, Belle and I'd be happy to help you with one of those bottles, but we can't tonight.
Are we still going to the meeting?
You've got one last meeting in an hour and then two days' rest.
Now, then... I'd like to be alone with Belle de jour.
Belle, I know you want to believe the best in him, but it's like you said... evil is not born, it is made, and that is exactly what the Black Fairy did to him.
Belle, I can only go with what I see and what I know.
Because, Belle, I'm the only who's been there.
